Jargon Term: It is important to take your pantoprazole (Protonix) as prescribed, as this helps prevent excess acid that could contribute to bleeding.
Also, avoid any "NSAID"s (example - ibuprofen, naproxen, aspirin) or alcohol.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Diet

Jargon Term: If you develop coffee ground or bloody vomiting, blood in your stool, fevers, lightheadedness, abdominal pain, or any other concening symptoms, please call your physician or come to the emergency room immediately.
Please set up a follow-up appointment with Dr. [**Last Name (STitle) 6431**] at ([**Telephone/Fax (1) 11720**] for 1-2 weeks after discharge.
